title: Pushpa 2: The Rule
description: After the gripping events of Pushpa: The Rise, Pushpa Raj continues his reign in the red sandalwood smuggling world. With greater enemies and higher stakes, Pushpa must fight against odds to protect his people and legacy.
cast: Allu Arjun, Rashmika Mandanna, Fahadh Faasil
language: Telugu (Available in Hindi, Tamil, Kannada, Malayalam, and English Dubbed)

title: Blade of Light
description: A warrior's journey to reclaim his honor.

title: Dreamer of Secrets
description: A scientist unveils a hidden world of dreams.

title: Edge of Heart
description: Two souls find each other against all odds.

title: The Stripped Boyfriend
description: A hilarious take on relationships and misunderstandings.

title: The Silent Future
description: A dystopian world where silence is the only hope.
